text: A yi kidene kala geyane fari, a kide gɛmɛne yibɔ, a Asera kide gbindonne rabira. Musa saɲi sawura sula daxin naxan nafala,18.4 Saɲi sawurana fe mɔn sɛbɛxi Yatɛne 21.8-9 kui. a na fan kala, bayo Isirayila kaane yi wusulanna ganma na nan yɛtagi na waxatini. Na saɲi sawuran yi xili nɛn Nehusatan.
